parameters.name: Config
parameters.description: The updated configuration of the watermark template. The value is a JSON object. For more information, see [Parameter details](~~29253~~).

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The new name of the watermark template. The value can contain letters and digits and can be up to 128 bytes in size.

parameters.name: WaterMarkTemplateId
parameters.description: The ID of the watermark template that you want to update. To obtain the ID of the watermark template, you can log on to the **ApsaraVideo Media Processing (MPS) console** and choose **Global Settings** > **Watermark Templates** in the left-side navigation pane.
